typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Customer Staging Key} as integer,
		{WWI Customer ID} as integer,
		Customer as string,
		{Bill To Customer} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Buying Group} as string,
		{Primary Contact} as string,
		{Postal Code} as string,
		{Valid From} as timestamp,
		{Valid To} as timestamp,
		{Customer Surrogate Key} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> Integration
source(output(
		{Customer Key} as integer,
		{WWI Customer ID} as integer,
		Customer as string,
		{Bill To Customer} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Buying Group} as string,
		{Primary Contact} as string,
		{Postal Code} as string,
		{Valid From} as timestamp,
		{Valid To} as timestamp,
		{Lineage Key} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DimCustomer
Integration, DimCustomer lookup(Integration@{WWI Customer ID} == DimCustomer@{WWI Customer ID},
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupIDs
LookupIDs split(ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionSplit1@(NewRow, CheckForUpdates)
ConditionSplit1@NewRow derive(is = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> SetAttrsForNew
SetAttrsForNew sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		{Customer Key} as integer,
		{WWI Customer ID} as integer,
		Customer as string,
		{Bill To Customer} as string,
		Category as string,
		{Buying Group} as string,
		{Primary Contact} as string,
		{Postal Code} as string,
		{Valid From} as timestamp,
		{Valid To} as timestamp,
		{Lineage Key} as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> Dimension
